projects.title: Small
projects.description: Small python projects I made a few years ago, for fun, in one collection.

projects.title: Spigot Sign Editor
projects.description: A simple sign editor plugin made for Minecraft 1.16+

projects.title: Robot Maze
projects.description: An AI that solves mazes (CS118 Programming Coursework)

projects.title: Large Arithmetic Collider
projects.description: A solver written in Haskell for an arithmetic game (CS141 Functional Programming Coursework)

projects.title: Waffles
projects.description: A restaurant review website, with hand-written data structures (CS126 Data Structs & Algorithms Coursework)

projects.title: Noto Qin Jianzipu
projects.description: A font designed to allow typesetting of the special notation used for Guqin, which is usually handwritten. Based off Noto Sans SC.
